changes.comment: * Added FocusTrapZone capability: When the FTZ is focused, it will pass focus to a child element.  The new prop 'focusTransferRule' controls the child-choosing behavior.  * Fixed FocusTrapZone bug: If first child in the FTZ is a FocusZone and that FZ's last focused child is not the first focusable child, shift-tab would break out of the FTZ.
